DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Parent Delivered Interventions Children With Autism
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria autism participant : Children age 1.6 17.11 year age Males females Diagnosis autism base DSMIVTR criterion , expert clinical evaluation , ADOS ADIR need Receiving receive parent deliver intervention alleviate symptom related diagnosis autistic disorder Have care provider reliably bring subject choose intervention clinic visit , trustworthy provide accurate account service provide subject Inclusion Criteria developmentally delay participant : Will age range 1.6 17.11 year age Males females Diagnosis developmental delay disorder base DSMIVTR , ICD10 , expert clinical evaluation Have historical evidence significant abnormal developmental milestone determine neurological history Receiving receive parent deliver intervention Have care provider reliably bring subject choose intervention clinic visit , trustworthy provide accurate account service provide subject Exclusion Criteria autism participant : Is medically unstable ( e.g. , one seizure month ) Have medical diagnosis cause autism like symptomology ( e.g. , Fragile X , Down syndrome , Angelman 's syndrome , tuberous sclerosis , Rett 's disorder ) Exclusion Criteria developmentally delay subject : Is medically unstable ( e.g. , one seizure month ) Has diagnosis ASD
